page.title: 10CHANGING COMMUNITIES
page.content: Transport is the main change in village life,as it enables people to mix with other communities.Where families were inter-related,new blood has been brought in;changing names and skills.Farmers wives were very much part of the farm life but are now more independent and follow their own ideas Finance is another area of change. Farmers who once employed ten men, now due to modern machinery only employ two.Consequently workers are in better financial position.Fashion is often behind the times. An interest in clothes lacking except in the young. Elderly people seem to disapprove of the freedom of the younger community and their values towards money, marriage and social benefits.The younger generation,frustrated, leave the village but eventually return - life at home isn't that bad.
